location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter reports that ships dispatched for the Shiek Nassaras have returned bearing news of his death. The letter further states that the eldest son (not named) of the deceased anticipates trouble with the succession as Shiek Kaunum, cousin of the deceased, has desired possession of the Government of Bushire for some time. The Resident expects that the Persian Government will seek to draw out the election process in order to further their own interests.
